prompt: Create a map view page with a full-screen map and a minimalist design. Include a top app bar with the title 'Minimal Map' in black text, a white background, and no leading icon for a clean look. Add a floating action button in the bottom-right corner with a grey GPS icon (Colors.grey) and a transparent background with a thin grey border (1px). The map area should have a pure white background (Colors.white) with no additional decorations. Use Material Design principles, focusing on simplicity and clarity, with minimal padding and no shadows or elevations.
